title: The Varnished truth
creator_credit: Elly Temelcos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Elly Temelcos and her two sisters spent hours over the years listening to her father’s stories, about life in the village, the war that tore his country apart and the sorrow of separation.
